casebody.data:
Thomas P. LAVIN, Appellee, v. L. CURTH & SONS, Inc., Appellant. Laura G. LAVIN, Appellee, v. L. CURTH & SONS, Inc., Appellant. Nos. 102, 123. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 21, 1931. James J. Mahoney, of New York City (George J. Stacy and Edward F. Quinn, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. William G. Walsh, of New York City, for appellees.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N-HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgments affirmed.
